idea-plugin.name: Hiberbee Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Vivid, color-intensive dark theme for Jetbrains IDE with consolidated color code for all programming languages.

Features:
  • Unique color identity map for all language elements and constructs
  • Adopted both for new UI and legacy one (2020.2 and older)
  • Includes registry tweaks for consistent view of elements rounded corners and arcs
  • Part of Hiberbee UI themes collection, including Insomnia, Windows/macOS terminals, PowerShell, Starship and others. See Github for details
  • Design is available and maintained in Figma template color palette
Upcoming in next releases:
  • Light theme
  • Settings page with colors map tuning
  • More tweaks and improvements on colors map consistency
  • VSCode & Fleet theme adaptation

Appreciate for all community members feedback and bndigital fellows for UX/UI advisory and assist.

Recommended companion plugins:
  • Atom Material Icons
  • Rainbow Brackets
  • Power Mode II
  • IdeoLog
  • Grep Console
